reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress to be a high-quality garment that looks more expensive than it is, with thick material that doesn't look cheap. They appreciate its flattering fit that hugs all the right spots, and one customer mentions it works well with 4-inch heels. The dress receives positive feedback for its comfort, with one noting it's not itchy, and customers like its length, with one mentioning it can be worn long or short. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dress to Impress
items.body: This dress was beautiful. The colors were vibrant and the ruching on the dress added a nice detail. It is a little sheer, even with the added layer underneath, but not so much so that it looks cheap or tacky. It is long and the fabric has a good bit of stretch which makes it comfortable to wear. I ordered a size small and normally wear a size 4 and it fit perfectly. Read more
items.author: Sarah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Womens Cocktail Dress
items.body: The MARZXIN Women's Cocktail Dress is an absolute showstopper! From the moment I tried it on, I knew it was a winner. The fabric is soft, comfortable, and has the perfect amount of stretch to hug in all the right places while still allowing freedom of movement. The design is both elegant and flattering, with attention to detail that makes it look far more expensive than it is. I received countless compliments when I wore it to a recent eventâ€”it truly made me feel confident and chic. The fit was true to size, and the quality exceeded my expectations. Whether for a wedding, party, or formal event, this dress is a versatile and timeless addition to any wardrobe. Highly recommend for anyone looking to make a statement without breaking the bank! ðŸ’ƒâœ¨ Read more
items.author: Kaj

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE IT
items.body: Iâ€™m absolutely in love with the MARZXIN Women's Long Sleeve Maxi Dress! This dress is a showstopper. The bodycon fit hugs my curves beautifully, while the ruched design adds a flattering, elegant touch that slims and shapes in all the right places. The fabric is soft and comfortable, making it perfect for both day and evening wear. The tie-dye pattern is absolutely stunningâ€”unique and eye-catching without being too bold. Itâ€™s perfect for making a statement at a cocktail party or a night out. The long sleeves and mesh details add a little extra sophistication and make this dress versatile enough for cooler weather, yet still breathable and light enough for warmer days. I love how the dress feels stylish and chic, but still comfortable enough for all-day wear. Whether you're attending a cocktail event, a dinner party, or just want to stand out in a crowd, this dress is a fantastic choice. I highly recommend it for anyone looking for a beautiful, form-flattering maxi dress! Read more
items.author: Maida

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Well made, great fit. Poor choice of thread color
items.body: Love that this dress is fully lined and is true to the photos. Iâ€™m 5â€™3â€ and it worked well with a 4â€ heel. At 145lbs, the medium fit well. I really like this dress. My only critique is that the serger thread used was white and could be seen on one side seam. This made one side of the dress look like it was bursting at the seams when it wasnâ€™t. A little better attention to detail on the thread choices will help. The dress is durable despite being mesh. It never felt fragile and did not snag on anything. The color is nice, although my son said I looked like a sedimentary rock. Canâ€™t win them all I guess. Read more
items.author: Ashlee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful! Worth the price point.
items.body: Some dresses just make me feel good. This is one. Super soft. Love the colors. Snug in all the right places. For reference I am 5â€™5â€ 142# 36D and this is a small. I originally tried a medium and it was frumpy. Did not fit as it was intended. I would definitely recommend! Read more
items.author: S. Sims

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dresss day or evening events
items.body: This dress is everything. So beautiful and comfortable. The perfect stretching, great sheerness but not see through. Great value for the money. Read more
items.author: Mcribe

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy the dress. You wonâ€™t go wrong.
items.body: This dress was an absolute hit. Everywhere I went, I received compliments. What I love most is how it hugs your body in all the right places and how soft it feels against the skin. I also appreciate that itâ€™s lined underneath. It was a bit long on me, so Iâ€™ll have it hemmed, but that doesnâ€™t take away from how well-made and beautiful this dress is. I loved it so much that I ordered another in a different design. For reference, I ordered an XL, Iâ€™m 5â€™5â€, and I weigh 186 pounds. Read more
items.author: Teeky3

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Right Dress Wrong color
items.body: The Dress is beautiful and fits great! I got a size Small. Iâ€™m 5â€2 with a 2-3in heel on. This is only an image of me trying it on. I purchased the dress to wear to a wedding where guest are to wear a shade of green. The dress looks more â€œblueâ€ in person with NO shade/tint of green at all. Other than that I like the dress and the material feels durable. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Long Sleeve Bodycon Maxi Ruched is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Long Sleeve Bodycon Maxi Ruched is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: B-print Zebra, A-color160, A-color152, A-color162, A-color154, Z-black Flower, A-color156, A-color155, Z-pink Rose, B-gradient Pink, Z-dyeing Dark Red, B-gradient Blue, Z-white Brown, Z-blue Flower. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
